tacos.name: The Original Taco Al Pastor
tacos.description: Our signature marinated pork taco!! Two corn tortillas, topped with sliced pineapple, cilantro, and onions

tacos.name: Traditional Mexican Style Tacos
tacos.description: Served on two corn tortillas topped with onions and cilantro

tacos.name: Fish Taco
tacos.description: Lightly breaded fish fillet, topped with shredded lettuce, pice de gallo and our delicious chipotle sauce, served on a flour tortilla

tacos.name: Grilled Fish Taco
tacos.description: Grilled fish with shredded lettuce, pico de gallo with avocado salsa on a soft grilled flour tortilla.

tacos.name: Taquitos
tacos.description: 4 fried chicken taquitos, served with lettuce, sour cream and cotija cheese with a side of cream salsa
